divs: sighting detailsi was on my way to sea world at the wendy's on opposite corner of the sea world entrance. we were waiting in traffic at the red light in between sea world and wendys i always watch the sky and was talking about how pretty the blue sky and cotton candy looking clouds looked. when i spotted the shiny object coming from behind the clouds and told the person in the back seat to look at it. but he couldn't see it he wears glasses 24\7 to correct his vision. then it went back behind the clouds. so i told my friend to look at a certain cloud formation and that it would be coming out from behind it. i say it come into sight but again he could not. the a helicopet came into view much closer than the ufo but in the same path direction. and then about 25 seconds later the ufo disappeared.
trends: There have been 112 other sightings in Orlando
There were no other sightings in Orlando on or around February 17th 2006
Summary: came from behind clouds into free air then into clouds again and back out and shortly after disappeared
